Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 39 points in Oklahoma City's victory over the New York Knicks.
Isaiah Joe contributed 31 points, including eight three-pointers, off the bench.
Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the New York Knicks with a score of 126-101.
The Thunder surged into a 31-17 lead after the first quarter and maintained their dominance throughout the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oklahoma City's win stretched their lead to 31-6 at the top of the Western Conference standings.
